PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Proven track record of delivering scalable web applications and leading cross-functional teams. Strong problem-solving skills with a passion for clean code and continuous learning.

Web Frameworks: Django, Flask, React, Node.js, Express

June 2021 - Present
